architectural_notes: React #185 infinite render loop caused by unstable callback identity in PracticeGamePage â†’ ApaRackScoringPanel useEffect dependency chain
Fixed React #185 by wrapping handleLiveRackUpdate with useCallback([session]) to stabilize function reference between renders

existing_features.title: In frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeGamePage.tsx, add useCallback to the React imports from 'react'

In frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeGamePage.tsx, wrap the handleLiveRackUpdate function with useCallback and [session] as the dependency array. Keep the function body exactly the same - only add the useCallback wrapper around it.

projectName: Fix React error #185 infinite render loop with useCallback
